description: Cliff Jensen & Steven Daigle have a standing workout appointment at the gym every week. You know the routine: a little lifting, a little cardio, a little bag work, and then a little grappling. Of course, once the wrestling begins, anything is possible. Once the competitive spirit kicks in, and the adrenaline gets going, you kind of can't help getting overly excited. Well before you know it, Steven and Cliff are on the mat in nothing but their jock straps and fighting is the last thing on their minds.  Enjoy!
title: TO THE MAT
